docs.snippet: ROSEFSKY--Julie. The Tripp Lake Camp and Camp Takajo families mourn the passing of our dear friend and mother of Maya and Eli. We send our heartfelt condolences to the Rosefsky and Fergang families....
docs.lead_paragraph:
ROSEFSKY--Julie.

The Tripp Lake Camp and Camp Takajo families mourn the passing of our dear friend and mother of Maya and Eli. We send our heartfelt condolences to the Rosefsky and Fergang families.

docs.snippet: ROSEFSKY--Julie. In loving memory of Julie Fergang Rosefsky, an extraordinary friend who will be missed tremendously. Our hearts go out to Steven, Eli, Maya and the entire Fergang family. Much love, Wendy & Lee Chaikin, Ray & Ross Hammerman, Hilar...
docs.lead_paragraph:
ROSEFSKY--Julie.

In loving memory of Julie Fergang Rosefsky, an extraordinary friend who will be missed tremendously. Our hearts go out to Steven, Eli, Maya and the entire Fergang family. Much love, Wendy & Lee Chaikin, Ray & Ross Hammerman, Hilary & Gregg Smith

docs.snippet: MENDELOW--Steven. Congregation Rodeph Sholom mourns the death of our longtime, devoted member, Steven Mendelow. We will miss his caring devotion to family, friends and our synagogue. Our heartfelt condolences are extended to his beloved wife, Nanc...
docs.lead_paragraph:
MENDELOW--Steven.

Congregation Rodeph Sholom mourns the death of our longtime, devoted member, Steven Mendelow. We will miss his caring devotion to family, friends and our synagogue. Our heartfelt condolences are extended to his beloved wife, Nancy, children, Pam and Cara and grandchildren, Michael, Alex and Jessica. Robert N. Levine, DD, Senior Rabbi Martin Flumenbaum, President

headline.main: Love Returns to Cleveland, Uncertain for Game Three
headline.print_headline: Love Returns to Cleveland, Uncertain for Game Three

docs.snippet: Cleveland Cavaliers forward Kevin Love was cleared to fly home with the team on Monday, but his availability for Game 3 of the NBA Finals on Wednesday night at Quicken Loans Arena in Cleveland remains in question....
docs.lead_paragraph: Cleveland Cavaliers forward Kevin Love was cleared to fly home with the team on Monday, but his availability for Game 3 of the NBA Finals on Wednesday night at Quicken Loans Arena in Cleveland remains in question.

docs.snippet: BARASH--Carolyn Uhlfelder, passed away peacefully on June 6th, surrounded by her loving family and dedicated caregivers, Karen, Martina, Carmen and Cherryl. Cherished wife of the late Michael, devoted mother to Jane Novick (Richard) and Barbara Ba...
docs.lead_paragraph:
BARASH--Carolyn Uhlfelder,

passed away peacefully on June 6th, surrounded by her loving family and dedicated caregivers, Karen, Martina, Carmen and Cherryl. Cherished wife of the late Michael, devoted mother to Jane Novick (Richard) and Barbara Barash. Beloved grandmother to Hillary Sherman (David) and Jeffrey Novick. Proud great-grandmother to Zachary and Matthew, "her special little boys." Private graveside service will be held on Wednesday.

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  TORRES, IDA BERROCAL

docs.snippet: BERROCAL TORRES--Ida Inez, on June 5, 2016. Loving mother of Diego J. (Joyce) and the late Antoinette Nagle. Beloved grandmother of Diego F. and Joaquin. Cherished sister of Josephine and the late Victor, Carmen, Lydia and Sylvia. Also survived by...
docs.lead_paragraph:
BERROCAL TORRES--Ida

Inez, on June 5, 2016. Loving mother of Diego J. (Joyce) and the late Antoinette Nagle. Beloved grandmother of Diego F. and Joaquin. Cherished sister of Josephine and the late Victor, Carmen, Lydia and Sylvia. Also survived by many nieces and nephews. Family will receive friends at Frank E. Campbell--The Funeral Chapel, 1076 Madison Ave., Wednesday and Thursday 2-4 and 7-9pm. Funeral mass Friday 10:30am, St. Patrick's Cathedral, East 51st Street and 5th Ave.

docs.snippet: TELFER--D. Dean, passed away on 7th May 2016. Respected architect, brother of David, uncle to Simon and Emma and much loved friend....

TELFER--D. Dean,

passed away on 7th May 2016. Respected architect, brother of David, uncle to Simon and Emma and much loved friend.
